Description: __________________________________________ BRAND NEW FROM USA AUTHORIZED ARMOURLITE DEALER! FACTORY BOX, PAPERS & CORRECT AUTHORIZED DEALER STAMPED FACTORY WARRANTY CARD INCLUDED! Armourlite,- Pocket Alarm Clock-Watch! NEW 2017 Model: ALPW01 This Cool little pocket alarm watch has a Built in stand to set on your dresser at Night with Night Glow Modules so you can see it in the Dark! H-3 Powered Modules are consistant and stable in the dark and can be seen all night without any dimming over time like regular clocks. Specifications; Movement: Seiko YM24a alarm clock quartz movement. Features: Date & Alarm Clock, & Time. Crystal: Anti-reflective scratch-resistant Sapphire crystal. Case Material: Solid 316L Stainless Steel Case Color: Stainless Steel (Silver) Case Diameter: 46mm Case Thickness: 12.8mm Crown: Push Bezel: Stationary Dial Color: white Note: Clear protector shown over dial [Sapphire]. Hands Color: Black Tritium Markers: Green and orange T25 Swiss tritium markers. H-3See Black Light enhanced photos for layout. Water Resistance: Dustproof Only Battery: 60-months Warranty: 2 years. USA Retail $299.00 USA retail includes free FOB as shown: Additional $15. Dollar value. This is a Brand New watch complete with Factory packaging, instruction booklet & Correct Dealer stamped Factory Warranty! Comes in the New Factory presentation case. Please see our Ebay store for All the Latest 2017 Model Genuine ARMOURLITE watches & Bands. We also Service ARMOURLITE Timepieces. _______________________________ International Buyers – Please Note: Import duties, taxes and charges are not included in the item price or shipping charges. These charges are the buyer's responsibility. Please check with your country's customs office to determine what these additional costs will be prior to bidding/buying. These charges are normally collected by the delivering freight (shipping) company or when you pick the item up –Please Do Not confuse them for additional shipping charges. We do Not mark merchandise values below value or mark items as "gifts" - US and International government regulations prohibit such behavior. ____________________________________ A special note about your Authorized ARMOURLITE Dealer! Sales & Service. Today there are many venues and choices available for purchasing a Top Quality item! You can also see the New Models of Armourlite watches that are in stock All year long. We Thank you for looking at our internet items and we will continue to provide the best internet shopping experience with the old fashioned personal one on one our parents and grandparents expected! WW&J has one location. In the USA. Homestead, Florida 33030. Master Watchmakers Since 1957. CW-21 Certified Master Watch Repair. Your Trusted Swiss Connection! ReturnPolicy.Description:
Our Ebay  return policy. 
Warranty cards are filled out and issued [Assigned] to you the buyer prior to shipping for all new items for your continued protection.
   You will be required to return the item prior to refund being issued.
We do NOT have a ship & review policy to get a look at the item.  When you purchase the item we have to assume you know that you want it and wish to make the purchase.
We provide factory warranties for all our new Dealer items. This is primary for your protection & assurance that you are covered for manufacturing defects.
 Once the item is used [worn] the item is not returnable and the warranty will govern any necessary corrections. No fault returns incur a restocking fee.  All shipping and handling costs in connection with returns are the responsibility of the customer.
